attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK should stop all Foreign Aid - the savings from this could be used to reduce Council Tax. Too many people I know in council housing don't work to get their rents and council tax paid by the system. Lowering council tax would give an incentive to work.

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/LookafterNo1
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
